About Me: Eva Katharina Wolf

A little bit about myself

Iʼm Eva, a 29 year old aspiring front-end developer from Germany. Iʼm passionate about user-centered development and a creative outside-the-box thinker. My background lies in Human-computer-interaction (B.Sc. and M.Sc.), where I learned many skills in computer science, development and psychology. Additionally, I gained professional experience as a Product Designer at a Fintech and a Pharma company for several years.

Living in the beautiful city of Copenhagen, I’m currently looking for positions as a front-end developer. I believe in lifelong learning and love to improve myself and to dive into new challenges and opportunities.

Outside the office, I enjoy spending time in nature or at the gym, and learning Danish. Creativity is also a big part of my free time, I have been an amateur photographer for many years and enjoy pottery and painting.
